issue.title: [C++] Passed CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS are being dropped, fix compiler warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-219](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-219). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I was investigating the compiler warnings that have popped up in the C++ build and found that the `-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS="-Werror"` was not being respected. I will fix and also address compiler warnings
